newsAndEvents.title: CEC Completes Upper Marsyandi Feasibility Study
newsAndEvents.excerpt: Clean Energy Consultants successfully completed the feasibility study for the Upper Marsyandi HPP (150 MW), one of Nepal's largest hydropower projects.
newsAndEvents.content: The comprehensive feasibility study for the Upper Marsyandi HPP has been completed, marking a significant milestone in Nepal's renewable energy development.

newsAndEvents.title: Hydropower Development Workshop
newsAndEvents.excerpt: CEC organized a comprehensive workshop on modern hydropower development techniques and environmental best practices.
newsAndEvents.content: Industry experts from CEC led an interactive workshop discussing the latest trends in hydropower design and sustainable energy development.

newsAndEvents.title: Isuwa Khola Project Enters Construction Phase
newsAndEvents.excerpt: The 97.2 MW Isuwa Khola Hydropower Project, with CEC's technical support, has entered the active construction phase.
newsAndEvents.content: After successful feasibility and design phases, the Isuwa Khola project has commenced full-scale construction with CEC providing continuous bank monitoring.

newsAndEvents.title: Renewable Energy Conference 2024
newsAndEvents.excerpt: CEC participated as lead sponsor in Nepal's largest renewable energy conference, showcasing latest innovations.
newsAndEvents.content: CEC presented cutting-edge research on hydropower optimization and grid integration at the national renewable energy conference.
